name: Push-ups
description: Classic bodyweight exercise for chest, shoulders, and triceps
instructions: Start in plank position, lower body until chest nearly touches floor, push back up

name: Squats
description: Fundamental lower body exercise targeting quads, glutes, and hamstrings
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower down as if sitting in chair, return to standing

name: Plank
description: Core strengthening exercise that engages entire body
instructions: Hold body in straight line from head to heels, engage core throughout

name: Burpees
description: Full-body explosive exercise combining squat, plank, and jump
instructions: Squat down, jump back to plank, do push-up, jump feet to hands, jump up with arms overhead

name: Pull-ups
description: Upper body pulling exercise for back, biceps, and shoulders
instructions: Hang from bar, pull body up until chin clears bar, lower with control

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
description: Classic chest exercise using dumbbells for balanced development
instructions: Lie on bench, press dumbbells from chest level to full extension, lower with control

name: Deadlifts
description: Compound movement targeting posterior chain and full body strength
instructions: Hip hinge movement, keep bar close to body, drive through heels to stand tall

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Dynamic cardio exercise targeting core and cardiovascular system
instructions: Start in plank, alternate bringing knees to chest in running motion

name: Lunges
description: Unilateral leg exercise for strength and stability
instructions: Step forward into lunge, lower back knee toward ground, return to standing

name: Overhead Press
description: Vertical pressing movement for shoulders and triceps
instructions: Press weights from shoulder level to overhead, lower with control
